options.name: Create Or Modify Attendance Groups
options.action: Create Or Modify Attendance Groups Attendance Attendance Group
options.description: Attendance groups are used to set attendance policy for a department or employee in a specific place and within a specific time period (including clock-in/out, late in, early out, sick leave, marital leave, funeral leave, public holidays, business hours, and overtime). You can use attendance groups to set attendance rules such as attendance methods, attendance time, and attendance locations for departments or specific employees. API reference documentation: [Create or modify attendance groups]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/group/create)

options.name: Obtain Attendance Group Details
options.action: Obtain Attendance Group Details Attendance Attendance Group
options.description: Obtains attendance group details via an attendance group ID. API reference documentation: [Obtain attendance group details]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/group/get)

options.name: Delete Attendance Group
options.action: Delete Attendance Group Attendance Attendance Group
options.description: Deletes a shift via shift ID. API reference documentation: [Delete attendance group]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/group/delete)

options.name: Search Shift By Name
options.action: Search Shift By Name Attendance Attendance Shift
options.description: Searches the shift information by the name of the shift. API reference documentation: [Search shift by name]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/shift/query)

options.name: Obtain Shift Details
options.action: Obtain Shift Details Attendance Attendance Shift
options.description: Obtains shift details via shift ID. API reference documentation: [Obtain shift details]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/shift/get)

options.name: Delete Shift
options.action: Delete Shift Attendance Attendance Shift
options.description: Deletes a shift via shift ID. API reference documentation: [Delete shift]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/shift/delete)

options.name: Create Shifts
options.action: Create Shifts Attendance Attendance Shift
options.description: Shift is a general term used to describe the time rules for an attendance task, such as how many attendances are required for a shift, on and off time of each attendance, how long is the attendance delay being considered as late, and how long is the attendance delay being considered as lack. API reference documentation: [Create shifts]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/shift/create)

options.name: Query Schedule Information
options.action: Query Schedule Information Attendance Attendance Schedule
options.description: This API is used to query schedule information for multiple users. The query time span can't exceed 30 days. API reference documentation: [Query schedule information]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_daily_shift/query)

options.name: Create Or Modify Schedule
options.action: Create Or Modify Schedule Attendance Attendance Schedule
options.description: A schedule describes the shifts that the employees in an attendance group are assigned to work each day. Currently, a schedule can be created for one or more people for a period of one full month. API reference documentation: [Create or modify schedule]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_daily_shift/batch_create)

options.name: Query Statistics Headers
options.action: Query Statistics Headers Attendance Attendance Statistics
options.description: Queries the statistics headers for daily or monthly statistics supported by the attendance statistics. API reference documentation: [Query statistics headers]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_stats_field/query)

options.name: Query Statistics Settings
options.action: Query Statistics Settings Attendance Attendance Statistics
options.description: Queries the header settings of statistical report for daily statistics or monthly statistics customized by developers. API reference documentation: [Query statistics settings]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_stats_view/query)

options.name: Update Statistics Settings
options.action: Update Statistics Settings Attendance Attendance Statistics
options.description: Updates the header settings of statistical report for daily statistics or monthly statistics customized by developers. API reference documentation: [Update statistics settings]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_stats_view/update)

options.name: Query Statistical Data
options.action: Query Statistical Data Attendance Attendance Statistics
options.description: Queries statistical data for daily or monthly statistics. API reference documentation: [Query statistical data]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_stats_data/query)

options.name: Batch Query Attendance Flow Record
options.action: Batch Query Attendance Flow Record Attendance Attendance Records
options.description: This API is used to batch query the actual attendance flow records of employees within your authorization scope. If the shift set by the company for an employee is clock-in at 9:00 am and clock-out at 6:00 pm and the employee punches in and out several times during this period, this API will return all attendance records. API reference documentation: [Batch query attendance flow record]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_flow/query)

options.name: Obtain Attendance Flow Record
options.action: Obtain Attendance Flow Record Attendance Attendance Records
options.description: Obtains user attendance flow record via the attendance record ID. API reference documentation: [Obtain attendance flow record]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_flow/get)

options.name: Obtain Attendance Results
options.action: Obtain Attendance Results Attendance Attendance Records
options.description: Obtains the actual attendance results of employees in the Company, including the clock-in/out result. API reference documentation: [Obtain attendance results]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_task/query)

options.name: Import Attendance Flow Record
options.action: Import Attendance Flow Record Attendance Attendance Records
options.description: Imports the attendance flow record of authorized employees. After the import, the final attendance status and result can be calculated according to the shift rules of the employee's attendance group. API reference documentation: [Import attendance flow record]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_flow/batch_create)

options.name: Obtain Correction Record
options.action: Obtain Correction Record Attendance Attendance Correction
options.description: Obtains correction records of authorized employees. API reference documentation: [Obtain correction record]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_task_remedy/query)

options.name: Modify User Settings
options.action: Modify User Settings Attendance User Settings
options.description: Modifies the user settings of employees in your authorization scope, including face photo file IDs. API reference documentation: [Modify user settings]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/user_setting/modify)

options.name: Upload Files
options.action: Upload Files Attendance Files
options.description: Uploads a file and obtains its file ID. This ID can be used as the face_key parameter in the "Modify user settings" API. API reference documentation: [Upload files]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/attendance-v1/file/upload)

options.name: Get User Attendance Data
options.action: Get User Attendance Data Attendance Attendance Historical Version Api Reference Task
options.description: API reference documentation: [Get User Attendance Data]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/Attendance//RetrieveUserApprovals)

options.name: Add Approved Data In Feishu Attendance
options.value: Add Approved Data In Feishu Attendance
options.action: Add Approved Data In Feishu Attendance Attendance Attendance Historical Version Api Reference Task
options.description: API reference documentation: [Add Approved Data in Feishu Attendance]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/Attendance//AddApprovalsInLarkAttendance)
